title: Add langlearn-imagegen MCP server (generate_image, health, list_providers)
description:
MCP server exposing generate_image/health/list_providers using library API. Depends on imagegen library and providers.
Cross-repo deps: langlearn-types: langlearn-types-lcd, langlearn-types-mxm, langlearn-types-dst

title: Implement imagegen library API using langlearn-types (generate + optional evaluator)
description:
Implement library API generate(ImageRequest, evaluator=None) returning ImageResult and provider selection. Depends on langlearn-types contracts.
Cross-repo deps: langlearn-types: langlearn-types-lcd, langlearn-types-mxm, langlearn-types-dst

title: Enable Pexels image fetch for imagegen demo
description: Wire PEXELS_API_KEY via direnv and prove imagegen can fetch a real Pexels image for end-to-end demo output.
close_reason: Added PEXELS_API_KEY keychain lookup to .envrc and verified live Pexels fetch for end-to-end image output.

title: Port OpenAI Image + Pexels providers into langlearn-imagegen
description:
Port OpenAI Image and Pexels providers into imagegen and map to ImageProvider interface. Depends on langlearn-types protocols.
Cross-repo deps: langlearn-types: langlearn-types-lcd, langlearn-types-mxm

title: Add langlearn-imagegen CLI (generate, evaluate-only, dry-run)
description:
CLI for generate/evaluate-only/dry-run using library API. Depends on imagegen library and providers.
Cross-repo deps: langlearn-types: langlearn-types-lcd, langlearn-types-mxm, langlearn-types-dst
